dde17939-b512-4c8c-a322-de29181ca219.name: Directional
dde17939-b512-4c8c-a322-de29181ca219.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

760eb8a1-60a8-436e-9e3d-a0c5206a37d1.name: Tough Skin
760eb8a1-60a8-436e-9e3d-a0c5206a37d1.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

4a57ccad-616b-4f69-99a9-88425c147057.name: Oxygen Storage
4a57ccad-616b-4f69-99a9-88425c147057.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

586e79f0-d820-4453-a1f7-afefc263161f.name: Oxygen Storage
586e79f0-d820-4453-a1f7-afefc263161f.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

a1c88d1e-982c-4d24-90f6-a54c69a44c98.name: Oxygen Storage
a1c88d1e-982c-4d24-90f6-a54c69a44c98.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

c7b067bf-2c2e-4297-80f3-55af23373afb.name: Oxygen Storage
c7b067bf-2c2e-4297-80f3-55af23373afb.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

8411831d-24ab-4f21-a39b-afdfc39a025f.name: Oxygen Storage
8411831d-24ab-4f21-a39b-afdfc39a025f.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

fa79898f-9bad-4aaf-951f-e539d3f984ab.name: Diffuse
fa79898f-9bad-4aaf-951f-e539d3f984ab.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

6b67c72b-a952-43bb-98de-31e3ad15fedb.name: Homogenous
6b67c72b-a952-43bb-98de-31e3ad15fedb.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

a50ca796-247c-4a73-a590-eae24d3edd48.name: No Blood
a50ca796-247c-4a73-a590-eae24d3edd48.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

483b0f9c-9e24-4c57-9849-da406c9278be.name: No Brain
483b0f9c-9e24-4c57-9849-da406c9278be.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

28020d42-89c1-4bec-a25b-a9b12ec1d2c6.name: No Eyes
28020d42-89c1-4bec-a25b-a9b12ec1d2c6.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

5f7413a6-fe5b-4b50-a364-5c1b1e985ec4.name: No Head
5f7413a6-fe5b-4b50-a364-5c1b1e985ec4.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

d55bd376-950a-4d29-8e77-dfb65ee5e84d.name: No Neck
d55bd376-950a-4d29-8e77-dfb65ee5e84d.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

8b9f3d48-a98a-4f5c-ab1b-456ddd15c297.name: No Vitals
8b9f3d48-a98a-4f5c-ab1b-456ddd15c297.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

7f960982-01ef-47a7-abc7-7767a9d31b09.name: Unliving
7f960982-01ef-47a7-abc7-7767a9d31b09.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

e1480a43-fdc7-4d70-9e30-564afdb1fad0.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

5d7f2b8d-5ea8-4a8e-8c69-601d90e5c6b6.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

dc2c6c4d-e2a9-4515-b9b8-49e7d9c01b26.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
